Amy had recently started a new job, straight out of college. Young, bright and pretty, she had a good future ahead of her and she was determined to make the most of it. Her new job was working in a commercial sector of a well known high street bank. As a new starter, she wasn't very high up the ranks, but she knew she could use her looks and her brain to get high quickly.

Working in the commercial sector of the bank meant she met a lot of people who were considered very important customers, people who the bank would not want to risk losing.

Amy was sitting at her desk, and being eager to learn, she was watching the manager, Miss Hawthorne, talk to, and attempt to convince several prospective business customers to join. According to Miss Hawthorne, failure with these particular customers was not an option.

As she mused over this, she noticed a tiny figure moving around by the leg of her desk. She knew what it was, they had been suffering with an infestation of these mini guys for almost a month. This presented two problems: an infestation like this looks unprofessional and unclean and could loose them custom. The other problem is that it's technically illegal to kill them, so getting rid of the infestation was taking time, as they had to be relocated rather than killed... well that's the official version. In reality, Amy knew that whenever officials and customers weren't looking, any and all steps were being taken by the bank to remove the mini guys, even if that meant killing them. As long as no-one found out, no-one would care.

Amy had to ensure these important customers now being shown around the office did not see any signs of the infestation. Quickly looking around to be sure no-one was watching, she moved her leather ballet-flat clad foot until it's shadow engulfed the guy. He looked up as this happened, but it was too late. Amy got a glance of the terrified look on his face, and noticed he was actually very old, with wrinkled skin. He seemed to have been trying to pick up a morsel of food the cleaners must have missed. Then he disappeared from sight beneath her foot. Without putting a lot of pressure on him, Amy dragged her foot back to roll the old man towards her. Now sitting back in her normal pose, she left her foot resting on him.

The business style black ballet flats she was currently wearing were chosen more for style rather than comfort. They were the only ones she could find which actually looked good enough with her outfit. Unfortunately they weren't very good quality, and she knew this. The sole was so thin it felt like she was walking bare foot everywhere, she could feel everything on the ground underfoot, and right now she could feel every movement and squirm the unfortunate guy beneath them was making.

She still didn't put much pressure onto him, it wasn't because she cared about him, he was most likely suffocating with her foot firmly pressed on top of him and that didn't bother her. It was because of the awful mess and noise they made when they were stepped on. Doing it here would leave a big stain on the carpet, and the crunching and screaming would attract the attention of the customers.

Patrick Holder had had a long and hard life. He was only a child when all the men in the world mysteriously shrunk, and ever since then he had fought hard in order to survive. The mini men of the world had long come to the realization that most of the women of the world had no intention of trying to find a cure for them, or even help them. They were left to fend for themselves, finding themselves living in horrible conditions in order to hide from the women that now actively tried to exterminate them.

There were of course laws implemented in modern times due to a small minority activists who actually cared about the men. These laws had the killing of the little men forbidden, but they had never been enforced. The laws only existed to made the activists a little quieter.

Men had eventually set up their own mini societies and build mini villages and towns, but progression has been hampered in the form of the women who towered above them. They had spend years building up one town in a place that was currently uninhabited by the women, only for it all to be destroyed as a single group of females walked through and literally over the top of it all, crushing the buildings and workers beneath their feet.

Food was also an issue. A lot of men still lived among the women for this reason, it was far easiest to get food here. But it was also far easier to lose your life here.

Patrick had been with a large group of his friends sneaking around the bank looking for anything they could eat, as right now food was more limited than ever due to a series of unlucky events.

They had been watching the half eaten biscuit that has been dropped on the floor for a few minutes, waiting for the girl at the desk to leave, but she didn't. Knowing they had to move on, and at 65 years old, the oldest and therefore wisest of the group, Patrick moved in.

Unfortunately, today, his age and hunger seemed to have caught up with him, and he had been seen. He immediately knew his life was over as he saw the twisted expression of the young and pretty girl above him, quickly replaced by the black patterned sole of her shoe. He didn't try to run, knowing it'd be futile. He had seen so many of his kind go before him in this way, and at this point, nothing anyone did ever helped them to live. As his long life flashed before him, the soft sole of her shoe hit him in the face, knocking him to the floor, where he remained lying helplessly beneath her. He felt his young executioners foot slide backwards, the cool rubber on the sole of her shoe rolling his body against the rough carpet, giving him severe burns. She stopped sliding her foot, lifted it slightly so as to position it vertically him, then lowered it so that he was pinned, his feet beneath her heel and his face beneath her toes. He subconsciously realized the thin nature of the sole of the girls ballet flat allowed him to feel each individual movement of her toes above him through the rubber.

He felt her toes tense slightly, and he knew this movement all too well as he'd seen it many times in the past. It is the first one a girl makes when she has her foot on top of a mini guy. She was getting her toes in position to press them firmly against the insole of her shoe, in order to crush the unfortunate victim of hers that lies against the other side of those toes, the outsole. His already burnt body was now in agony as the sole of her flat irritated his skin. The insole of her flat was soft and gently cushioning her delicate toes above him, but the outsole was affording him so such luxury. It was cold, hard and gritty. The only thing her shoe was applying to him was the pressure that her delicate toes were forcing onto him.

The pressure suddenly became immense, and Patrick felt his nose break simultaneously to several ribs and his spine snapped. His life once again flashed before his eyes, and he felt anger that he had had such an incredibly hard life, where several second had counted towards his continued survival. And now his life was to be taken, in such an humiliating fashion, beneath the foot of a privileged girl, who had never had probably never had a second in her life where she had to worry about her life. While he felt incredibly increasing pain at every break of the bones on his body, she only felt a few crunches as they vibrated easily through the thin sole of her flat to her soft foot. He felt yet another increase in pressure, before briefly sensing, with an overwhelming feeling of agony, his body burst from the sides, and his internals flowing out and sinking deeply into the small grooves of the shoe.

Amy had to press very firmly onto her victim as he was larger than most, his body stretching the full length of her foot. To ensure he was dead, she stood up slightly from her seat, focusing more of her weight onto the man. As she did this, she felt a large pop which tickled the soft sole of her foot before feeling a slippy fluid beneath her shoe.
